name: Clocker After Death
description:
After the game Clocker Beyond Death, You shouldn't have done what you've done. You should have died, Now you will suffer something worse than death, There is only one escape, and  you need 10 cars in a huge building to leave, It's not as easy as it looks. 

W A S D To move Mouse to look, P to pause game, E to interact Avoid touching objects because they make sound, Collect all 10 Toy cars, Escape, Avoid Shadow.
